title: Riot Matchmaking at its BEST
body:
Just lost a game and first I am just horrified at the amount of deaths my teamates have but when I was looking at the OP.GG something caught my attention. 

[https://imgur.com/a/hu7QgFH]

Yes that Ashe catches the eye too with that damage, but why is this plat 5 on my team. Everyone else in the game is plat 2 or higher and the enemy team has a diamond 5. How is it that he is playing with mostly people that are almost a league higher that he is. Anyway I was curious to see so I went to this dudes page and then saw this.

[https://imgur.com/a/r8Ws6Nq]

This person has never been higher than plat 5 so why would he ever be in a game with people plat 2 and above? I mean lets not even get into the fact that this person might even be boosted looking at his ranked history

[https://imgur.com/a/5gQqP2p]

Never higher that gold 4 until all of a sudden Oct 23rd and then shoots to plat 5 by november 7th then barely plays ranked..... interesting Thanks riot for the GREAT MATCH MAKING. As even if this person was legit there is no reason to have 1 plat 5 and the rest Plat 2's, 1's, and Diamon 5's. GGGGGG

replies.body: Even so I feel the ranges should be more spread this is straight up 1 person that doesn't belong with the rest. you are telling me they could not have found a plat 4 or 5 to replace the diamond 5 on their team. This is weird
